first_para: Tom Elliott (born 11 December 1963) is a Northern Irish politician who has been the Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for Fermanagh and South Tyrone since 2003, and was the Leader of the Ulster Unionist Party from 2010 to 2012.

full.extract:
Tom Elliott (born 11 December 1963) is a Northern Irish politician who has been the Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for Fermanagh and South Tyrone since 2003, and was the Leader of the Ulster Unionist Party from 2010 to 2012.
^ Ulster Unionists pick Tom Elliott as new party leader
full.title: Tom Elliott
